name: trebuchet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large device used in wars in the past for throwing large rocks, for example at the walls of a castle that was being attacked: The action of a trebuchet was similar to that of a giant catapult.
rogerpilkington/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
